product_name: REI Evaporator Single Ski Bag - Women's
long_description: The women's REI Evaporator Single Ski Bag is a great choice for transporting your skis and poles to the mountain, or taking them on a flight. Heavy-duty tarpaulin-lined interior fits a pair of skis up to 191cm in length and a pair of ski poles; dedicated internal sleeves hold poles neatly. Mesh panels and grommet openings promote air circulation and moisture drainage, helping combat edge rust. Compression straps on outside of bag secure contents; also use them to secure the folded-over end of the bag when you're carrying short skis. Webbing carry handles with padded hand strap ease transport. The REI Evaporator Single ski bag is constructed with rugged 600-denier polyester and beefy zippers to last many seasons.
short_description: The women's REI Evaporator Single Ski Bag is a great choice for transporting your skis and poles to the mountain, or taking them on a flight.
